final class DefaultTypeEnvironment
extends AbstractEnvironment<String,Type>
implements TypeEnvironment

substitute

public TypeEnvironment substitute(TypeSubstitution s)
Applies the substitution s to all types in this type environment and returns the new TypeEnvironment, which may be equal to this type environment if s did not change any of the types within.

Specified by:
substitute in interface TypeEnvironment
Parameters:
s - the TypeSubstitution to apply.
Returns:
the resulting TypeEnvironment.

TypeEnvironment.substitute(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeSubstitution)
